text: @RandPaul Realize that covid-19 is especially hard on those with respiratory issues & diseases. Not the time to be a hero. My mom has COPD (also  Diabetic)& my mother in law is on oxygen for the rest of her life, they don't appreciate your stance. Please respect others. #StayHomeSaveLives
